程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.ai

类 AiController

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.BaseController
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.ai.AiController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AiController extends BaseController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the AI chat panel. Handles user input, message sending, and UI updates for the AI assistant.
